00001 // HyperLink.cpp : implementation file
00002 //
00003 // HyperLink static control. Will open the default browser with the given URL
00004 // when the user clicks on the link.
00005 //
00006 // Copyright (C) 1997, 1998 Chris Maunder (chrismaunder@codeguru.com)
00007 // All rights reserved. May not be sold for profit.
00008 //
00009 // Thanks to Pål K. Tønder for auto-size and window caption changes.
00010 //
00011 // "GotoURL" function by Stuart Patterson
00012 // As seen in the August, 1997 Windows Developer's Journal.
00013 // Copyright 1997 by Miller Freeman, Inc. All rights reserved.
00014 // Modified by Chris Maunder to use TCHARs instead of chars.
00015 //
00016 // "Default hand cursor" from Paul DiLascia's Jan 1998 MSJ article.
00017 //

00027 CHyperLink::CHyperLink()
00028 {
00029     m_hLinkCursor       = NULL;                 // No cursor as yet
00030     m_crLinkColour      = RGB(  0,   0, 238);   // Blue
00031     m_crVisitedColour   = RGB( 85,  26, 139);   // Purple
00032     m_crHoverColour     = ::GetSysColor(COLOR_HIGHLIGHT);
00033     m_bOverControl      = FALSE;                // Cursor not yet over control
00034     m_bVisited          = FALSE;                // Hasn't been visited yet.
00035     m_bUnderline        = TRUE;                 // Underline the link?
00036     m_bAdjustToFit      = TRUE;                 // Resize the window to fit the text?
00037     m_strURL.Empty();
00038 }
00039 
00040 CHyperLink::~CHyperLink()
00041 {
00042     m_Font.DeleteObject();
00043 }

00057 BOOL CHyperLink::PreTranslateMessage(MSG* pMsg) 
00058 {
00059     m_ToolTip.RelayEvent(pMsg);
00060     return CStatic::PreTranslateMessage(pMsg);

00062 
00063 void CHyperLink::OnClicked()
00064 {
00065     int result = (int)GotoURL(m_strURL, SW_SHOW);
00066     m_bVisited = (result > HINSTANCE_ERROR);
00067     if (!m_bVisited) {
00068         MessageBeep(MB_ICONEXCLAMATION);     // Unable to follow link
00069         ReportError(result);
00070     } else 
00071         SetVisited();                        // Repaint to show visited colour
00072 }
00073 
00074 HBRUSH CHyperLink::CtlColor(CDC* pDC, UINT nCtlColor) 
00075 {
00076     ASSERT(nCtlColor == CTLCOLOR_STATIC);
00077 
00078     if (m_bOverControl)
00079         pDC->SetTextColor(m_crHoverColour);
00080     else if (m_bVisited)
00081         pDC->SetTextColor(m_crVisitedColour);
00082     else
00083         pDC->SetTextColor(m_crLinkColour);
00084 
00085     // transparent text.
00086     pDC->SetBkMode(TRANSPARENT);
00087     return (HBRUSH)GetStockObject(NULL_BRUSH);
00088 }
00089 
00090 void CHyperLink::OnMouseMove(UINT nFlags, CPoint point) 
00091 {
00092     CStatic::OnMouseMove(nFlags, point);
00093 
00094     if (m_bOverControl)        // Cursor is currently over control
00095     {
00096         CRect rect;
00097         GetClientRect(rect);
00098 
00099         if (!rect.PtInRect(point))
00100         {
00101             m_bOverControl = FALSE;
00102             ReleaseCapture();
00103             RedrawWindow();
00104             return;
00105         }
00106     }
00107     else                      // Cursor has just moved over control
00108     {
00109         m_bOverControl = TRUE;
00110         RedrawWindow();
00111         SetCapture();
00112     }
00113 }

00115 BOOL CHyperLink::OnSetCursor(CWnd* /*pWnd*/, UINT /*nHitTest*/, UINT /*message*/) 
00116 {
00117     if (m_hLinkCursor)
00118     {
00119         ::SetCursor(m_hLinkCursor);
00120         return TRUE;
00121     }
00122     return FALSE;
00123 }
00124 
00125 void CHyperLink::PreSubclassWindow() 
00126 {
00127     // We want to get mouse clicks via STN_CLICKED
00128     DWORD dwStyle = GetStyle();
00129     ::SetWindowLong(GetSafeHwnd(), GWL_STYLE, dwStyle | SS_NOTIFY);
00130     
00131     // Set the URL as the window text
00132     if (m_strURL.IsEmpty())
00133         GetWindowText(m_strURL);
00134 
00135     // Check that the window text isn't empty. If it is, set it as the URL.
00136     CString strWndText;
00137     GetWindowText(strWndText);
00138     if (strWndText.IsEmpty()) {
00139         ASSERT(!m_strURL.IsEmpty());    // Window and URL both NULL. DUH!
00140         SetWindowText(m_strURL);
00141     }
00142 
00143     // Create the font
00144     LOGFONT lf;
00145     GetFont()->GetLogFont(&lf);
00146     lf.lfUnderline = m_bUnderline;
00147     m_Font.CreateFontIndirect(&lf);
00148     SetFont(&m_Font);
00149 
00150     PositionWindow();        // Adjust size of window to fit URL if necessary
00151     SetDefaultCursor();      // Try and load up a "hand" cursor
00152 
00153     // Create the tooltip
00154     CRect rect; 
00155     GetClientRect(rect);
00156     m_ToolTip.Create(this);
00157     m_ToolTip.AddTool(this, m_strURL, rect, TOOLTIP_ID);
00158 
00159     CStatic::PreSubclassWindow();
00160 }

00165 void CHyperLink::SetURL(CString strURL)
00166 {
00167     m_strURL = strURL;
00168 
00169     if (::IsWindow(GetSafeHwnd())) {
00170         PositionWindow();
00171         m_ToolTip.UpdateTipText(strURL, this, TOOLTIP_ID);
00172     }
00173 }

00180 void CHyperLink::SetColours(COLORREF crLinkColour, COLORREF crVisitedColour,
00181                             COLORREF crHoverColour /* = -1 */) 
00182 { 
00183     m_crLinkColour    = crLinkColour; 
00184     m_crVisitedColour = crVisitedColour;
00185 
00186         if (crHoverColour == -1)
00187                 m_crHoverColour = ::GetSysColor(COLOR_HIGHLIGHT);
00188         else
00189                 m_crHoverColour = crHoverColour;
00190 
00191     if (::IsWindow(m_hWnd))
00192         Invalidate(); 
00193 }

00235 void CHyperLink::SetUnderline(BOOL bUnderline /* = TRUE */)
00236 {
00237     m_bUnderline = bUnderline;
00238 
00239     if (::IsWindow(GetSafeHwnd()))
00240     {
00241         LOGFONT lf;
00242         GetFont()->GetLogFont(&lf);
00243         lf.lfUnderline = m_bUnderline;
00244 
00245         m_Font.DeleteObject();
00246         m_Font.CreateFontIndirect(&lf);
00247         SetFont(&m_Font);
00248 
00249         Invalidate(); 
00250     }
00251 }

00271 
00272 // Move and resize the window so that the window is the same size
00273 // as the hyperlink text. This stops the hyperlink cursor being active
00274 // when it is not directly over the text. If the text is left justified
00275 // then the window is merely shrunk, but if it is centred or right
00276 // justified then the window will have to be moved as well.
00277 //
00278 // Suggested by Pål K. Tønder 
00279 
00280 void CHyperLink::PositionWindow()
00281 {
00282     if (!::IsWindow(GetSafeHwnd()) || !m_bAdjustToFit) 
00283         return;
00284 
00285     // Get the current window position
00286     CRect rect;
00287     GetWindowRect(rect);
00288 
00289     CWnd* pParent = GetParent();
00290     if (pParent)
00291         pParent->ScreenToClient(rect);
00292 
00293     // Get the size of the window text
00294     CString strWndText;
00295     GetWindowText(strWndText);
00296 
00297     CDC* pDC = GetDC();
00298     CFont* pOldFont = pDC->SelectObject(&m_Font);
00299     CSize Extent = pDC->GetTextExtent(strWndText);
00300     pDC->SelectObject(pOldFont);
00301     ReleaseDC(pDC);
00302 
00303     // Get the text justification via the window style
00304     DWORD dwStyle = GetStyle();
00305 
00306     // Recalc the window size and position based on the text justification
00307     if (dwStyle & SS_CENTERIMAGE)
00308         rect.DeflateRect(0, (rect.Height() - Extent.cy)/2);
00309     else
00310         rect.bottom = rect.top + Extent.cy;
00311 
00312     if (dwStyle & SS_CENTER)   
00313         rect.DeflateRect((rect.Width() - Extent.cx)/2, 0);
00314     else if (dwStyle & SS_RIGHT) 
00315         rect.left  = rect.right - Extent.cx;
00316     else // SS_LEFT = 0, so we can't test for it explicitly 
00317         rect.right = rect.left + Extent.cx;
00318 
00319     // Move the window
00320     SetWindowPos(NULL, rect.left, rect.top, rect.Width(), rect.Height(), SWP_NOZORDER);
00321 }

00324 // CHyperLink implementation

00326 // The following appeared in Paul DiLascia's Jan 1998 MSJ articles.
00327 // It loads a "hand" cursor from the winhlp32.exe module
00328 void CHyperLink::SetDefaultCursor()
00329 {
00330     if (m_hLinkCursor == NULL)                // No cursor handle - load our own
00331     {
00332         // Get the windows directory
00333         CString strWndDir;
00334         GetWindowsDirectory(strWndDir.GetBuffer(MAX_PATH), MAX_PATH);
00335         strWndDir.ReleaseBuffer();
00336 
00337         strWndDir += _T("\\winhlp32.exe");
00338         // This retrieves cursor #106 from winhlp32.exe, which is a hand pointer
00339         HMODULE hModule = LoadLibrary(strWndDir);
00340         if (hModule) {
00341             HCURSOR hHandCursor = ::LoadCursor(hModule, MAKEINTRESOURCE(106));
00342             if (hHandCursor)
00343                 m_hLinkCursor = CopyCursor(hHandCursor);
00344         }
00345         FreeLibrary(hModule);
00346     }
00347 }
00348 
00349 LONG CHyperLink::GetRegKey(HKEY key, LPCTSTR subkey, LPTSTR retdata)
00350 {
00351     HKEY hkey;
00352     LONG retval = RegOpenKeyEx(key, subkey, 0, KEY_QUERY_VALUE, &hkey);
00353 
00354     if (retval == ERROR_SUCCESS) {
00355         long datasize = MAX_PATH;
00356         TCHAR data[MAX_PATH];
00357         RegQueryValue(hkey, NULL, data, &datasize);
00358         lstrcpy(retdata,data);
00359         RegCloseKey(hkey);
00360     }
00361 
00362     return retval;
00363 }
00364 
00365 void CHyperLink::ReportError(int nError)
00366 {
00367     CString str;
00368     switch (nError) {
00369         case 0:                       str = "The operating system is out\nof memory or resources."; break;
00370         case SE_ERR_PNF:              str = "The specified path was not found."; break;
00371         case SE_ERR_FNF:              str = "The specified file was not found."; break;
00372         case ERROR_BAD_FORMAT:        str = "The .EXE file is invalid\n(non-Win32 .EXE or error in .EXE image)."; break;
00373         case SE_ERR_ACCESSDENIED:     str = "The operating system denied\naccess to the specified file."; break;
00374         case SE_ERR_ASSOCINCOMPLETE:  str = "The filename association is\nincomplete or invalid."; break;
00375         case SE_ERR_DDEBUSY:          str = "The DDE transaction could not\nbe completed because other DDE transactions\nwere being processed."; break;
00376         case SE_ERR_DDEFAIL:          str = "The DDE transaction failed."; break;
00377         case SE_ERR_DDETIMEOUT:       str = "The DDE transaction could not\nbe completed because the request timed out."; break;
00378         case SE_ERR_DLLNOTFOUND:      str = "The specified dynamic-link library was not found."; break;
00379         case SE_ERR_NOASSOC:          str = "There is no application associated\nwith the given filename extension."; break;
00380         case SE_ERR_OOM:              str = "There was not enough memory to complete the operation."; break;
00381         case SE_ERR_SHARE:            str = "A sharing violation occurred. ";
00382         default:                      str.Format("Unknown Error (%d) occurred.", nError); break;
00383     }
00384     str = "Unable to open hyperlink:\n\n" + str;
00385     AfxMessageBox(str, MB_ICONEXCLAMATION | MB_OK);
00386 }
00387 
00388 HINSTANCE CHyperLink::GotoURL(LPCTSTR url, int showcmd)
00389 {
00390     TCHAR key[MAX_PATH + MAX_PATH];
00391 
00392     // First try ShellExecute()
00393     HINSTANCE result = ShellExecute(NULL, _T("open"), url, NULL,NULL, showcmd);
00394 
00395     // If it failed, get the .htm regkey and lookup the program
00396     if ((UINT)result <= HINSTANCE_ERROR) {
00397 
00398         if (GetRegKey(HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT, _T(".htm"), key) == ERROR_SUCCESS) {
00399             lstrcat(key, _T("\\shell\\open\\command"));
00400 
00401             if (GetRegKey(HKEY_CLASSES_ROOT,key,key) == ERROR_SUCCESS) {
00402                 TCHAR *pos;
00403                 pos = _tcsstr(key, _T("\"%1\""));
00404                 if (pos == NULL) {                     // No quotes found
00405                     pos = strstr(key, _T("%1"));       // Check for %1, without quotes 
00406                     if (pos == NULL)                   // No parameter at all...
00407                         pos = key+lstrlen(key)-1;
00408                     else
00409                         *pos = '\0';                   // Remove the parameter
00410                 }
00411                 else
00412                     *pos = '\0';                       // Remove the parameter
00413 
00414                 lstrcat(pos, _T(" "));
00415                 lstrcat(pos, url);
00416                 result = (HINSTANCE) WinExec(key,showcmd);
00417             }
00418         }
00419     }
00420 
00421     return result;
00422 }
